div.bibl: Rassviet (The Dawn), June 24, 1926. DOUGLAS PARK SCHOOL

body.p: The Douglas Park School consists of four classes with a five-year course. By the list of examinations it is to be seen that the following subjects are taught: Russian language, arithmetic, Russian geography, and Russian history.
According to the decision of the special meeting of the School Society, during examinations parents of students and members of different cultural organizations may be present.
